channel.title: Docker on Shan Islam
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Shan Islam

item.title: Docker as a virtual Environment
item.description: There are loads of posts out there about Docker on how it works and building pipelines. This post is more about Docker from a data science point of view. Docker can be great when you need to deploy a pipeline,API and models to be run. However in my work I’ve come across situations where colleagues can’t use a package because they don’t have java installed or they do but the version is incompatible with their needs.
